website_summaries.verdict: A classic wooden block set that toddlers can use for building and learning.
pros: Raised letters make a good sensory tool
Helps to teach the alphabet, sequencing and patterns
A good size for small hands to grab
cons: These blocks are great for learning the alphabet, but they are a little small for stacking and can topple easily

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made product.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the packaging and little bag it came in but when I took the wooden boxes out of the bag while they were still in the wrapping a few of them were already chipped and peeled. Honestly, it’s a poorly made product as I wouldn’t want these paint chips in my child’s mouth. I will be trying to return these. Didn’t even bother using them as they are obviously chipped from cheap paint.
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: Good for baby shower game
customer_reviews.text: I got these alphabet blocks for a baby shower I'm hosting next month. The plan is to put them out with some sharpies for the guests to decorate for the mom-to-be. These blocks fit the bill for this purpose. Two of the letters are not perfect--it looks like the paint on the top is kind of smeared, but that's only the case for two of the blocks and the rest are perfect. And the size is nice. I found a smaller set for much cheaper but the blocks are not nearly as big as this one, and for my purpose the size was important.
customer_reviews.author: Amir Mehrnia

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP AND POSSIBLY DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: This product is very poorly made, with several letters having defects and some blocks even chipped right out of the packaging. I let my 7 month old play with a block that wasn't damaged, and within a half hour he was able to chew off the paint and part of the wood. I'm fairly laid back about things, but this is just not right. I would not consider it safe for children who might chew on it, and even then they are poorly made and can be easily chipped. I actually just tested scraping at the paint and it comes off with just my fingernail. Do NOT buy this product for your child!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Syverson

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple small alphabet block set!
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for my two year old daughter and the set is just ok. They are smaller then what I was thinking they were going to be but they work for what I needed. My daughter has a speech delay and we are working on letters with her right now and this set does the job. The nice thing about this set is that it comes with a bag to store the blocks in. This is just a simple small alphabet block set and I'm happy with my purchase. Just be aware of the size that you are wanting as the blocks are small. Other then that I would recommend this block set.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: The reason I bought these blocks were for a baby shower in which each guest would draw/color design the block and put there name somewhere so when the (older) child plays with them, they can also talk about that person! It becomes personal and it is a fun activity at the shower. The blocks came on time packaged very well. I love how they are not HUGE but a good medium size. They are just as pictured, colored well. The tote they come in is very nice for storage and an added bonus! Also, the price is crazy reasonable for these! Love them! I have used them at a different shower in the past and they are great quality! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: BAN

customer_reviews.title: Good Morning, My son Anderson loves his blocks
customer_reviews.text: Good Morning, My son Anderson loves his blocks!! He is going into kindergarten. The best feature was the backpack that came with it. He had placed all the blocks along with some other items in the backpack. He told me that he was going to NY for a golf tournament and had all his special belongings with him for the trip. Thank you! We have been very happy with the purchase. I felt that it was a great price point. I hope you enjoy the rest of the summer. Thank You, Brooke Shafer
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Shafer

customer_reviews.title: I love the alphabet blocks I received for my 19 month ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the alphabet blocks I received for my 19 month old daughter. I expected them to be larger but they are fine as they are. She and I have a great time building with them while at the same time she is identifying her colors and letters. I also love the backpack carrier they came with. It makes her feel like a big girl when I place the backpack on her back. These blocks will last and I will definitely be able to pass them on once she has mastered her alphabet, colors and building skills. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Eason

customer_reviews.title: Size issue
customer_reviews.text: I need standard size wooden blocks, and these were only one inch in size. The size was not listed on the ad, and I assumed that because they cost more, that the were the traditional sized blocks. But, they weren't, so I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Donna West

customer_reviews.title: Wood
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I remembered blocks to be but, well, I’m much bigger than the last time I had reason to be around blocks. These are about 1 1/4 in cubes. They’re wood, colorful and will be much less painful when stepped on than Legos. Bought these for a baby who will hopefully grow into using them for more than a chew toy. One can hope.
customer_reviews.author: Las Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Paint chips off of blocks!
customer_reviews.text: The paint is chipping off of most of the blocks, which makes the letters hard to read. They make a mess and I was worried about my daughter getting the paint chips into her mouth or on her skin (not sure what kind of paint it is!)
customer_reviews.author: Emily H

customer_reviews.title: Great blocks for 2/6 year old
customer_reviews.text: I bought the blocks for my 2 year old daughter . I thought the Best part about them was the included bag. I'm currently deployed, so my husband showed to me on FaceTime. He likes them and plans to use them with my older son (6) as well to spell his out sight words. I like that when I get back, my daughter will already be learning more about colors and letters since she can do multiple learning games with these blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. JAMRSN

customer_reviews.title: So much better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful hand crafted product! Very pleased with this product and my 3 year old son could not wait to get his hands on them! The blocks are the perfect size for little hands and they would make a great gift for a child or would work well as props for a photoshoot for a baby,toddler or maternity shoot. Would also make a great stocking stuffer as the holidays approach :)
customer_reviews.author: Mhmorales808

customer_reviews.title: Affordable wooden alphabet blocks
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for an educational toys from our 19 months old daughter, and we found this blocks. The blocks are well made and appear to be quit smaller than we expected, but the size are actually great for her small fingers and hands. We had this almost a week or so and the paint has not been chipped or anything. The wood material is nice and dense.I feel like this is a great investment and it will last for a long time. The shipping was fast and I will definitely repurchase the toys from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Junebug

customer_reviews.title: Quality Learning Tool
customer_reviews.text: I got these to work on short words with my 4 year old daughter. It has more than enough of each letter to create the 'at', 'all', 'ed', etc. words. She also has fun stacking and making towers and such with these blocks. A nice added feature is that it comes with a bag so after we/she uses them they all get put away together. Overall, a very good educational tool for our home preschool time.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Farris

customer_reviews.title: Ok but a bit dissappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a four star because I do not like that there is a opposite letter on the other side of the cube. So A has Letter O on the other side of it. I feel it creates confusion when i show my 2 year old the letter A then she sees an O if she turns the cube. Other than that, the blocks arw fine. They are wood blocks so be careful when children are playing because if thrown they will certainly hurt someone.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Still playing with them almost a year later!
customer_reviews.text: These are great little wooden blocks. My daughter still plays with them after an entire year. They also are beginning to get even more use now that she is hitting the age to learn letters and colors. And when shes not stacking them, I have fun seeing how tall i can build a tower before she knocks them down. Also great for travel with the bag they come with and the small size.
customer_reviews.author: Allycia Goodpaster

customer_reviews.title: Little smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 17 month old granddaughter. My 1st thought was could she choke on these! There a little bit smaller than the average wooden blocks. I guess I should have read better and got out a ruler. These will be harder for her to stack because of size.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Less than impressed
customer_reviews.text: These arrived pretty banged up with paint missing and chips in the wood and paint. They are also MUCH smaller than I expected which may be my fault for not reading carefully but I didn’t notice anywhere in the description that they were so small.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected, but quality made product
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is great for crafting or decorations, but found it too small to be a toy my one year old could use. I ended up returning it as the description wasn't clear on how small it was. The craftsmanship/quality was fine, but I wouldn't spend $20 for decorative blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Customer_Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I love these letter blocks. It's nice to have an old school kind of toy without something that needs to be charged or take batteries.. I am pregnant now and used these letters for my maternity shoot! I can't wait for my little one to learn her ABC's with them though!
customer_reviews.author: Nynittai

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and my baby loves them. Unfortunately they’ve started to chip off. That’s very disappointing considering my baby is barely 4 months old and has just (within 2 days) actively started using them. But they come with a cute little storage back and that’s nice!
customer_reviews.author: Coraline Jones

customer_reviews.title: Seriously where are the pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Letters and pictures are only on 2 sides. I feel like they cut corners by not printing on all sodes of the cube. While the company often makes good prodicts they also cut corners to inconvience customers.
customer_reviews.author: C. Marks

customer_reviews.title: These blocks are really cute!
customer_reviews.text: Just like the old fashioned alphabet blocks from my childhood. I can't really find any flaws with these and the bag they come with is great too! My only complaint is they are a bit smaller than I was expecting, but really it's not enough to take away a star!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Pool

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Not Satisfied at all buyer beware!! I got these for my son to help him learn the Alphabet and it isn't the complete alphabet. Some are double sided with another letter others are double sided with the same letters. I was really excited for these but not anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Timeless Toy
customer_reviews.text: I remember having these when I was a kid. My great grandson and nd his baby sister can learn the alphabets quickly and have fun using them as building blocks. Great Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: heave

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. We haven't really started using it to make words because my child just wants to stack them but i know later on this will be really helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jacobo

customer_reviews.title: Play and Learn
customer_reviews.text: Not only was the product as described but it came with a offer of lessons using the blocks. Outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dralle

customer_reviews.title: Great size and color
customer_reviews.text: There's not much wrong with these blocks. They are the perfect size for his hands and he loves the colors. Even better is the bag that comes along with it. Other companies don't think of this, but the travel bags are great and he knows that bag is for his blocks only. My only issue, which is not too big of a deal, honestly, is just the paint that is not completely neat, and it overlaps. But he doesn't notice, anyways.
customer_reviews.author: kking

customer_reviews.title: I like the size and the vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the blocks for your grandkids to have at our house. I like the size and the vibrant colors, they are going to be a wonderful educational tool. Thanks again for a great product to use with the custom block I made for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C.

customer_reviews.title: The plastic on the letters are off the letters!
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited then opened the box and the plastic on the letters are peeling off. Sucks when it’s for a baby shower and I live 40 min from any type of store
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: I used it to build tall buildings so my baby can smack it down. But it's kind of hard edge wooden blocks. Not safe for my baby to chew on it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee dia

customer_reviews.title: Nice Blocks!
customer_reviews.text: This product was perfect for the baby shower craft I had planned. With a letter on two sides, the other four sides were blank. This allowed guestes to sign/draw whatever they wanted. Good quality wood blocks with a nice tote to store them in.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Would honestly think that a set of 30 alphabet blocks ...
customer_reviews.text: Would honestly think that a set of 30 alphabet blocks should have all letters A to Z, nope two sets did not have all the letters combined.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Small for price
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed in the size of these blocks. They are wood with letters on 2 sides. It would get 5 stars if the blocks were bigger. To pricey for the size of them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal...
customer_reviews.text: Some of the blocks came with big dents in them. One was completely cracked. While these look cute I expected higher quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low quality paint flakes off blocks
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these blocks is not very good. Most of the blocks have paint bleeding over the edges and flaking off. As soon as we opened them up, my son was immediately interested in them and grabbing them and then I noticed the paint chips stuck all over his arms and hands that I had to start picking off before the paint chips all ended up in his mouth. I've included a couple photos showing flakes of paint that are about to come off a couple of the blocks.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Toy or weapon...
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good toy and learning tool. I wasn't sure I liked when my toddler discovered she could use the small blocks as weapons and throw them at people since they fit in her hand so nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Pluhar

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I wanted. Bought these for my grand, he lives stacking them and they help him with learning the alphabet. I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Ikeymary

customer_reviews.title: and the company was fantastic in their communication
customer_reviews.text: I sent this item back because the carved letters were not individual to each block. There are a couple letters on each block, which I wasn't expecting, nor did I want. The shipping was fast, and the company was fantastic in their communication. The letters simply did not work for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: R. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Nice blocks
customer_reviews.text: I especially like the orange storage bag that came with the sets
customer_reviews.author: the cleave

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment than in love with product.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t read the dimensions and was disappointed at first about the size, but than when my son opened them I realize that the quality was good. My son loves them and they are helping with teaching him his alphabet.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: great toy for big and small.
customer_reviews.text: I really like they are wood. I bought them for one of my patients and we can sit and play together. They are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: chris neri

customer_reviews.title: Alphabet Blocks
customer_reviews.text: Bright colorful blocks, love the wooden toys for my grandchildren to play with and also use for crafts.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Paschall Stoltz

customer_reviews.title: Good blocks
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot smaller than I imagined but I guess I didn’t exactly measure out the description. Nice alphabet blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Y.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby shower!
customer_reviews.text: Do you know how hard it is to find ABC blocks without writing/pictures all the way around? It's difficult lol. I bought these for my sister's baby shower. Each guest pulled out one block to decorate for baby girl on the way! I've attached a picture- they came out super cute! Very happy with the product :)
customer_reviews.author: KerriTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Blocks are small
customer_reviews.text: The blocks were smaller then I expected even though the size was indicated in the ad. They will be a gift so I can't comment on how they will hold up after use. If I had time I probably would return them for larger blocks.
customer_reviews.author: shoppergirl1

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Well made block and a great teaching tool. My daughter loves playing with her blocks and the manufacturer did a nice job putting different letters on each side in a way that allows for works to be spelled out that use more than one of the same letter.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M Childers

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: They are somewhat poor quality. Lots of paint chipped and even though the description clearly states that there are 2 different letters on each block, there are multiple blocks with the same letter on both sides of the block. This minor detail was important for what I wanted to do with the blocks for my maternity photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit sloppy...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't too thrilled with the quality of these blocks. Several of them had colored paint smeared and some had white paint smeared along the blocks. Overall some of the blocks were OK, some seemed very sloppy. Good size though.
customer_reviews.author: PA949

customer_reviews.title: Size and Letters
customer_reviews.text: They were just ok. Smaller than anticipated. Not appreciative that the letters were not the same on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: musicbaby12

customer_reviews.title: Cute wood blocks
customer_reviews.text: Used these as table decor for a birthday party. Would be cute for a baby shower as well!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great, a toy that will be used for years!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 10 month old grandson because he was coming to visit from out of state. They came in a very nice carry bag, so easy to clean up and put away. He absolutely loved them. The blocks are the perfect size for his little hands. At his age he loved that he was able to pick them up. Very nicely made. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan McAlvany

customer_reviews.title: It's Fine
customer_reviews.text: The blocks are just what you expect. I didn't get a complete alphabet but they warn you about that. Value for price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Not "standard" sized blocks.
customer_reviews.text: These very nice wooden blocks, just are much smaller than I thought. The colors are bright and vivid but they are slightly over 1" cubed. I had thought they were supposed to be 1.75" cubed. They are well made and solid made of good wood too. Very nice. Just not as large as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Barksdale

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of the size
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product, I am not afraid of my kids playing with these. Just read the description to be aware of the size, I thought they were bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Heydi Morales

customer_reviews.title: Letter on front and back don’t match.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that the letters on the front and back of the block don’t match. I intended on using these as a baby shower game where guests write on the block based on the letter but it became confusing because the letters were different.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Willmer

customer_reviews.title: They come with a bag to put them in.
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my one year old nephew, he just Loves them! He carries the bag around with him when he is not playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: The blocks are perfect. I got them for a friend's baby shower
customer_reviews.text: The blocks are perfect. I got them for a friend's baby shower. Each guest is going to write a little memo to the unborn baby to have for a keepsake. These were the only blocks I could find that had some blank spaces on some of the faces of the cube... instead of pictures to match the letter. So they turned out perfectly. I am also a 1st grade teacher and look forward to buying some of your products before school starts. Thanks for following up.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Tatsch

customer_reviews.title: Should not be sold for a toddler which is perfect for them to learn the ABC's
customer_reviews.text: WAY TOO SMALL for a toddler, the blocks can fit into my Grand daughter's mouth. Not safe for a toddler who put's things in their mouth, didn't even open the package, returning it ASAP!! Very dissatisfied with product... Should not be sold for a toddler which is perfect for them to learn the ABC's..
customer_reviews.author: Firelady

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These are tiny and poor quality. Most have paint chips in them.
customer_reviews.author: jkb84

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like this product
customer_reviews.text: Return it as soon as I got it. Some pieces came broken and the blocks are really small.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: My small kids love these. Whether they are trying to say letters, colors or build towers they love these. Nice buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for teaching
customer_reviews.text: This was a great teaching tool and reinforcement for behavior.
customer_reviews.author: Markki

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not well made
customer_reviews.text: These are junk. The paint is chipped where it's suppose to be and bleeding where it's not. They're also incredibly small. I'm sorry I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good old school wooden blocks.
customer_reviews.text: My toddler son likes to stack them in a tower
customer_reviews.author: MonstaMoment

customer_reviews.title: Great for little hands
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size great for little hands and easy to store
customer_reviews.author: carmelita murphy

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson LOVES them!
customer_reviews.text: My order came today. My 4 year old grandson must have thanked me a hundred times in the first half hour he had them.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Pagoota

customer_reviews.title: Great Blocks, Dumb Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I wish it came in a box, instead of a flimsy bag. Other than that, just as I remember from my childhood.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Supermom approved
customer_reviews.text: I like them very much . My only problem is that they are pretty small.
customer_reviews.author: BLU

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the blocks. My 8 month old can fit the block in her hands. I also liked the bag that came with it to store the blocks. I wish that all the sides had an illustration. This was a good buy and the price was fair.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy O

customer_reviews.title: Item has been returned for refund.
customer_reviews.text: This product was returned along with this item which was shipped along with SLHFPX Gift for 2-6 Year Old Kids,Magnetic Drawing Sketching Writing Table for 1-6 Year Old Kid Toys. I returned it along with the same item that it was shipped with.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Storage bag ripped within a week. Not sewn properly so it’s been difficult securing pieces especially when teaching a two year old to put things away.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Blocks are brightly colored and solid quality wood
customer_reviews.text: Blocks are brightly colored and solid quality wood. Small enough for my 8 month old to easily pick up, but not small enough to choke on. I would recommend them to anyone looking for a good quality set of classic letter blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Shane R

customer_reviews.title: very helpful
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves these. she likes playing with these. and can recognized some of the letters now.
customer_reviews.author: JCO25

customer_reviews.title: The most important to know is the product was delivered in a timely manner and was the very same item advertized and ordered ,
customer_reviews.text: The blocks I ordered arrived the very day they were scheduled to arrive,the product was exactly as advertised and exactly what I ordered.The blocks came in a handy little back pack bag just right for the toddler it was ordered for.I would most definitely recommend and also will continue to patronize this company
customer_reviews.author: charles dean

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected, but cute. The paint is a bit chipped and messy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny H

customer_reviews.title: Really Small.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning these as they are very small. They popped up in a Amazon search when I was looking for presents for a 1 year old. But they are much to small for a kid that still puts everything in there mouth.
customer_reviews.author: lmm34

customer_reviews.title: The paint on the blocks is messy! There are ...
customer_reviews.text: The paint on the blocks is messy! There are 30 blocks because I,M,N,and O are doubled in the set incase you are in need of specific letters.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for school!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when they were a lightening deal, so they were super affordable and we love them! I use them as a homeschooling tool. My kindergartener builds sight words with them and then sounds them out. I’m very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: heidi angotti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The blocks were very colorful and just the right size for small hands. They arrived promptly, in a very nice storage sack. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel D Creations

customer_reviews.title: We used these for a babyshower game. I wish ...
customer_reviews.text: We used these for a babyshower game. I wish they were a bit bigger (these are the standard size of alphabet blocks from your youth :) ) or if they came in a double set but not a reason to knock down a star.
customer_reviews.author: Axelapalooza

customer_reviews.title: Just like they should be
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Perfect size for little hands. Got these for my grandson. They're just like the ones I had for his mom when she was a baby. I bought a set for my house too! Just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MsNichols

customer_reviews.title: really bad on the Z
customer_reviews.text: Some of the paint was chipped off of some of the blocks, really bad on the Z, which oddly I need to use the most. The dimensions are listed, but they look really small in person.
customer_reviews.author: Jeana

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Fun
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my year old because of the fact that he could hold the letter in his hand, this makes a hands-on learning experience for him. I am thinking he could learn better this way. In addition to that I like the fact we also use the blocks to build objects. The blocks are big enough so I don't have to worry about my kid swallowing it. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: they were too small - picture is misleading. I had to return them
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Great for projects
customer_reviews.text: I have made over 800 of the "Namrthings" pictured for babies whose stories touch my heart. I have had a hard time finding blocks with the letters I need without any numbers with them. These are just letters and just what I looked for for a long time. The picture is sideways. Judi
customer_reviews.author: Judi W

customer_reviews.title: These are not the larger blocks.  This was my fault when ordering.
customer_reviews.text: These are smaller blocks than I thought. Probably my fault before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Gipper

customer_reviews.title: Really small!
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are a lot smaller than expected. My 18 month old doesn’t like them
customer_reviews.author: Michael Carney

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this item!
customer_reviews.text: The letters are tiny and they only have select double letters...they happened to have two Qs and not even two Es....we cannot even spell most words with this selection. Waste of my money!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Blocks
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the old school blocks. A bit smaller than I remember but they worked perfectly for my photo shoot
customer_reviews.author: mochachild04

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: They served purpose for a baby shower decor/activity, however, blocks smaller than expected. There were some cracks and defects. They came with a handy dandy draw string bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They were her favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my niece for her birthday! They were her favorite toy!
customer_reviews.author: India Aust

customer_reviews.title: I am using these for a baby sprinkle (shower) for ...
customer_reviews.text: I am using these for a baby sprinkle (shower) for everyone to design on the blocks with sharpies. They are non-toxic and won't harm the children. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Fox

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute I used them for my kids Toy Story theme table but I ended up getting 2 packs to spell happy birthday and both names
customer_reviews.author: Maria Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it. Love that they are still making these alphabet blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Popular toy
customer_reviews.text: A bit small, but very popular toy with my twin 3 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves them.
customer_reviews.text: My 9-month old granddaughter loves these. Her Mom keeps them in small stacks on a cubby shelf, and little bit crawls over and pulls up just to get at (and bite on) these blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Windy Nights

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these blocks to make an Alphabet Block Christmas Tree and they are perfect! They are of such nice quality, I would have also loved using them for my children when they were younger.
customer_reviews.author: runner3113

customer_reviews.title: cute but dangerous
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and my son loves them but they are very sharp. The edges are dangerous. I think I will have to sand all the edges. Anytime my son falls on them he's in tears. My husband stepped on one a few days ago and cut his foot open. I'd try to find ones that are not so sharp next time.
customer_reviews.author: Ryder DeFranco

customer_reviews.title: Choking hazard/bad printed letters
customer_reviews.text: Blocks are in my opinion a choking hazard. They’re the size of golf balls. Badly printed letters which make it hard for learning if the child cannot tell what letter is what.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

product_meta.title: Skoolzy ABC Wooden Blocks for Toddlers - 30 Wood Alphabet Blocks - Montessori Stacking Letter Preschool Learning Toys - Kindergarten Reading with Travel Tote
feature_bullets: Fun Toys that Teach! 1 inch blocks with 4 blank sides and two sides that have different letters.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED; we offer superb educational toys and excellent customer service and if you're not totally satisfied with your purchase; we also offer a risk-free, No-Questions-Asked, 100% Money-back Guarantee! Click the orange button to order now!

TODDLER BLOCKS: These wooden blocks for toddlers are a wonderful wood gift & Classic learning educational toys for 2 year olds! The building blocks are not just letter blocks, but are a Wonderful Wood Gift & Classic Education Learning Tool. These Montessori toys and toddler learning toys grow with your child. Use the wood alphabet blocks as building toys, toddler crafts, letter recognition, pincer grip and grasp stacking toys and even with their younger sibling as baby blocks wooden toys.

OCCUPATIONAL THERAPY TOYS: These manipulative are great autism sensory toys as children learn colors, sorting, stacking and fun games for toddlers by using these fine motor skills toys while developing letter, color recognition and hand eye coordination. Children will improve dexterity, fine motor control as they stack, play and build with the wooden alphabet blocks. The wooden blocks toys for autistic children provide toddler learning activities and basic skills in the included activity eBook.

PRESCHOOL LEARNING TOYS: The abc blocks are great building blocks for toddlers and preschoolers for introducing letters of the alphabet, color recognition, reading and writing in a fun way in preparation for kindergarten. The abc blocks wooden sorting toys include 30 blocks in 4 bright colors with large letters on the wooden building blocks. Also use as autism toys. Grab the 2 year old boy toys and toys for 1 year old girl toys & give your child a head start on learning their ABC's

TRAVEL TOYS FOR TODDLERS: EASY CLEAN UP: The wooden toys for 1 year old come with the Skoolzy toy storage backpack to conveniently store all the toddler games for 3 year olds. Your child can easily carry the Montessori Materials at home, in the car or for play dates! A washable 100% cotton Skoolzy backpack is included with the baby blocks for portability and easy storage of travel activities for kids on airplanes. The toddler travel toys make learning fun as they play with the abc blocks.

✅ BABY SHOWER DECORATIONS ✅ BEST GIFTS FOR GIRLS & BOYS: The toddler toys building construction set are staples needed in every home. The tinker toys wooden classic blocks are not only educational, but can also be used in a baby shower as baby shower favors, baby shower games, arts, crafts and other block letters for decor in your home or child’s room as nursery decor. EACH BLOCK MEASURES 1" SQUARE. These toys for toddlers are Not Intended For Children Who Still Place Objects In Their Mouth!
